group_1.textRight: That mocha bunny, was so cute wasn't iiit.
So super adorable wasn't iiit.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah yeah!
But that was, how do I put it...
more funny than cute!@Ahaha!

group_1.textRight: At least it's good that they seem to be having fun.

group_1.textLeft: ... *Giggle*

group_1.textRight: Oh Shizuku, good evening.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, good evening.@Thank you for always coming by.

group_1.textRight: *Giggle*@I should be saying that.

group_1.textLeft: Huh, what are those stones on the table...?

group_1.textRight: Ahh this, I've been addicted to fortune-telling lately.
Oh, I know.@If you'd like, how about all of you try it?
It's just a little hobby, of course, so I don't expect@any of it to come true. *Giggle*

group_1.textLeft: Yes yes!@I want my fortune told!

group_1.textRight: Well, if it's no big deal either way, I don't mind.
Me too, me tooo!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, me too, if you'd please...

group_1.textRight: *Giggle*@Thank you all.
It's a pretty simple type of fortune-telling,@so it won't take long.
Now just take a stone out of this bag...

group_1.textLeft: That's, like...
SUPER authentic-looking!!
Yeah yeah!@I'm also getting excited!

group_1.textRight: *Giggle*@Then let's get started, shall we.

group_1.textCenter: I'll announce them in the order drawn.

group_1.textRight: Yes, it seems like you'll have a wonderful meeting.

group_1.textLeft: Eeeehhhh!
I've already met Ryo and Ikumin!@It totally came true!!

group_1.textRight: Next is yours, hmm.
You'll come across something very interesting, yes.

group_1.textLeft: That's already wished for and granted, as far as I'm concerned.

group_1.textRight: Yours is...
Today you will fall down.

group_1.textLeft: Huh?

group_1.textRight: Here's a band-aid, please be careful.

group_1.textLeft: Eehhh!@What kind of fortune is this for me!

group_1.textRight: And now for Shizuku's...@Hmm...
You may lose [textRed:something important] to you.
It may be good to be careful for the time being.

group_1.textLeft: ...Okay.
This, is so heart-poundingly thrilling...!@I wonder, if I could become a fortune-teller...!

group_1.textRight: You'd probably spend too much time telling weird@gags to give anyone a proper fortune, anyway.
Heey, do you think, I will really fall down?

group_1.textLeft: Mine was dead on!@Maybe yours will really be true!?

group_1.textRight: Eeeehhh, I'm scared.

group_1.textLeft: Well, I don't think you really need to be that careful about it?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I don't!
I only believe in good fortunes.

group_1.textLeft: Shizuku, can you help me wash dishes for a little?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, got it.
Ah...

group_1.textLeft: Shizuku!@You okay?

group_1.textRight: ...Sorry.@I broke the mug.

group_1.textLeft: Nevermind that, you're not hurt are you?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I'm okay, but...

group_1.textLeft: Ohh, this was your favorite.

group_1.narration: Right, it is just fortune-telling after all.
It was an event that@I'd usually just forget about in no time.@Nothing more.
So, I don't care at all.
However, my favorite mug being cracked@leaves just a tiny bit of a@dark shadow in my heart.
